page.title: 19SECONDARY SCHOOL,RAMSGATE
page.content: Hereson Secondary school has 350-400 boys with 22 staff.The school has 3 sites:-a main building which is 77 years old with 2 halls on each floor; an annexe with craft rooms-the old primary school is now being taken over as well;a games field.Three main groups of children are formed-lower school for years 1&2;middle school for years 3&4 and upper school for the fifth year.On Tuesday and Thursday we have study skills to develop the ability to learn for ourselves.We have a number of clubs including chess, football,art and badminton.A newsletter called the Voice contains results of school lotteries,details about trips and fund raising events. The Parent Teacher Association raises money for new equipment and special evening meetings are held to inform parents for their children's progress.
